name: Patient Information

testSteps.description: 1: Patient Information ({subjectNumber=201807D9P, nationalId=201507D35, pLastName=Aliou, pFirstName=SADIO, cLastName=moses, cFirstName=mutes, cEmail=wrongEmail, cPhone=+23063458788, street=New York city, street 3334, commune=Grand yoff, town=Dakar, pPhone=ff223377, pEmail=wrongEmail, dateOfBirth=09/02/dd, nationality=American, age=20, status=invalid})

children.description: Given User logs in and visits Home page
And User clicks add order and goes to Add order Page
When User Expands Patient information form by clicking the + button next to Patient
And User Clicks New Patient Button
And User Enters Subject Number "201807D9P"
And User Enters National ID "201507D35"
And User Enters Patient Last Name "Aliou"
And User Enters Patient First Name "SADIO"
And User Enters Contact Last Name "moses"
And User Enters Contact First Name "mutes"
And User Enters Contact Email "wrongEmail"
Then Field validates "invalid" Contact Email
And User Enters Contact Phone "+23063458788"
And User Enters Patient Street "New York city, street 3334"
And User Enters Patient Commune "Grand yoff"
And User Enters Patient Town "Dakar"
And User Enters Patient Phone "ff223377"
Then Field validates "invalid" Patient Phone
And User Enters Patient Email "wrongEmail"
Then Field validates "invalid" Patient Email
And User Selects Patient Health Region
And User Selects Patient Health District from the drop down
And User Enters Patient Date of Birth "09/02/dd"
Then Field validates "invalid" Patient Date Of Birth
When User Enters Patient Date of Birth in future
Then Alert appears if Date is in the Future
When Date of Birth is left blank and Age "20" is filled
Then Field generates Date of Birth with correct year for the Age "20"
And Alert Appears if Age entered is -1 , 100 and >100
And User Selects Patient Gender
And User Selects Patient Education
And User Selects Patient Marital Status
And User Enters Patient Other Nationality "American"

testSteps.description: 2: Patient Information ({subjectNumber=201807D9P, nationalId=201507D35, pLastName=Aliou, pFirstName=SADIO, cLastName=moses, cFirstName=mutes, cEmail=contact@gmail.com, cPhone=+23063458788, street=New York city, street 3334, commune=Grand yoff, town=Dakar, pPhone=+23063458788, pEmail=pat@gmail.com, dateOfBirth=09/02/2019, nationality=American, age=20, status=valid})

And User clicks add order and goes to Add order Page

title: Patient Information

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When User Expands Patient information form by clicking the + button next to Patient
And User Clicks New Patient Button
And User Enters Subject Number "<subjectNumber>"
And User Enters National ID "<nationalId>"
And User Enters Patient Last Name "<pLastName>"
And User Enters Patient First Name "<pFirstName>"
And User Enters Contact Last Name "<cLastName>"
And User Enters Contact First Name "<cFirstName>"
And User Enters Contact Email "<cEmail>"
Then Field validates "<status>" Contact Email
And User Enters Contact Phone "<cPhone>"
And User Enters Patient Street "<street>"
And User Enters Patient Commune "<commune>"
And User Enters Patient Town "<town>"
And User Enters Patient Phone "<pPhone>"
Then Field validates "<status>" Patient Phone
And User Enters Patient Email "<pEmail>"
Then Field validates "<status>" Patient Email
And User Selects Patient Health Region
And User Selects Patient Health District from the drop down
And User Enters Patient Date of Birth "<dateOfBirth>"
Then Field validates "<status>" Patient Date Of Birth
When User Enters Patient Date of Birth in future
Then Alert appears if Date is in the Future
When Date of Birth is left blank and Age "<age>" is filled
Then Field generates Date of Birth with correct year for the Age "<age>"
And Alert Appears if Age entered is -1 , 100 and >100
And User Selects Patient Gender
And User Selects Patient Education
And User Selects Patient Marital Status
And User Enters Patient Other Nationality "<nationality>"
